articles.title: A look at who has been detained or deported in a US crackdown on pro-Palestinian protesters - The Associated Press
articles.description: Supporters of Palestinian causes with ties to American universities have been detained in the Trump administration’s crackdown on immigrants. President Donald Trump and other officials have accused protesters and others of being “pro-Hamas,” referring to the …
